definition: to be softhearted/to be tenderhearted/to be kindhearted
see 刀子嘴，豆腐心[dao1 zi5 zui3 , dou4 fu5 xin1]

sentences.english: Actually, what makes you soften is one's body.
sentences.chinese: 原来，最令人心软的，是一个人的身体。

sentences.english: Show to show west light Dutch courage, west light softhearted, two people attack relations.
sentences.chinese: 秀秀借酒劲向西光表达，西光心软，二人发作了关系。

sentences.english: I have also prepared to go abuse a cat-lover friend that is even softer-hearted than I am.
sentences.chinese: 我还准备去虐我一个比我还心软的爱猫朋友去。

sentences.english: His heart melted when he saw the little girl crying.
sentences.chinese: 看到这个小女孩哭起来，他的心软了。

sentences.english: He takes advantage of her kindness and borrows money too often.
sentences.chinese: 他利用她人好心软，三番两次向她借钱。

sentences.english: But Mrs. Joram could not command her softer self, and began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 但是周阑太太却忍不住心软，哭起来了。

sentences.english: Of course, the best referee won’t cave, no matter what.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，如论发生什么事，最好的见证人绝不会心软。

sentences.english: The little girl's tears melted his heart.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩的眼泪使他的心软了下来。

sentences.english: After a time, the king relented only enough to give the jester his choice as to how he would like to die.
sentences.chinese: 后来，国王有些心软了，但只是让他选择如何死而已。

sentences.english: Xiu mei believe son just mouth hard softhearted, and will never support you about.
sentences.chinese: 秀梅相信儿子只是口硬心软，并永远也支持君约。

sentences.english: China said no to the French cry for help.
sentences.chinese: 中国并没有因法国的苦苦哀求而心软。

sentences.english: There, in the wedding band boneyard, Charlotte started to melt down.
sentences.chinese: 就在结婚戒指的改造中心，夏绿蒂开始变得心软了。

sentences.english: I defy any woman not to melt when a man says that.
sentences.chinese: 男人讲这样的话，我敢说任何一个女人也会心软。

definition: to have a heart of stone/hard-hearted/unfeeling
lit. eats soft food, but refuses hard food (idiom)/amenable to coaxing but not coercion
see 刀子嘴，豆腐心[dao1 zi5 zui3 , dou4 fu5 xin1]
heart/intention/one's inclination/state of mind/to have the heart for sth/mood
to be foolish/to play dumb/to gaze absentmindedly
